page.title: 14 SPORTS GROUNDS
page.content:
Most of south Chiswick is covered by sports grounds leased from the Council. We visited the Civil Service ground which has 10% of local people as members. They usually come by car or public transport, but on special occasions by coach from all over Britain.
The Civil Service Sports Ground is 35 acres, including tennis courts, bowling green, rugby, football and hockey pitches. The ground is open every weekend and most Wednesdays. The busiest time is from early June till mid-July. If they are in a team, employees get half a day off to play, and more if it is a national team.
This year they have had problems with vandals slitting the inflated cover of the tennis courts.
